Package Tank

Class Tank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tank.Tank
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DieselTank, PremiumTank, UnleadedTank

    public abstract class Tank
extends java.lang.Object
    Tank abstract class that sets prereqs for a Tank concrete class
    Author:
    jacksonportersnow, tybayn, alexthayn

      Tank​()
      Creates a tank object (is a singleton object)

        public void refill​(double amount)
            throws TankException
        Fill tank to a given amount up to capacity of tank
        Parameters:
        amount - given amount
        Throws:
        TankException - error when capacity is hit

      • remove

        public void remove​(double amount)
            throws TankException
        Removes a specified amount of fuel from the tank until tank is empty.
        Parameters:
        amount - amount of fuel to remove
        Throws:
        TankException - error when tank is empty
